title: Non-Parametric Reconstruction of the Hubble Parameter from the Fourth Gravitational Wave Transient Catalog and DESI Baryonic Acoustic Oscillations
summary: Non-parametric reconstruction of the Hubble parameter using GWTC-4.0 and BAO measurements.

title: Inflation without an Inflaton II: observational predictions
summary: Observational predictions for inflation driven by a pure de Sitter background without a fundamental inflaton field.

title: SourceREACH: A New Source Reconstruction Algorithm Optimized for Giant Arcs and Galaxy Cluster Lenses
summary: A new source reconstruction algorithm optimized for giant arcs lensed by galaxy clusters, using KNN-based regression.
